diff_act: 1.Provide the storyline and instructions related to the fraction questions
2.user chooses to skip the movie by clicking a mouse button
3.Direct the user to the main menu if they click a mouse button to skip the movie.

regen.absent_element: the movie providing information to help the user complete fraction questions
regen.new_specification: The introductory movie shall include content that aids the user in understanding and completing the fraction questions.

regen.absent_element: skipping the movie by clicking a mouse button
regen.new_specification: If the user clicks a mouse button, the movie shall skip to the end and proceed directly to the main menu.

regen.absent_element: provision of storyline and instructions related to fraction questions during the movie
regen.new_specification: The movie will present a storyline of the game and provide instructions to help the user complete the fraction questions.

label: If a mouse click is received, this component will terminate the movie.
absence: situation of the a mouse click is received
